FinalNarrative: On 3/11/2016, at 09:30, an employee was performing a property claim adjustment on a one-story residential home roof. As the employee was exiting the roof, she fell from a ladder to the deck below. She was hospitalized with three broken ribs on the right side.
PartofBodyTitle: Chest, except internal location of diseases or disorders
EventTitle: Other fall to lower level, unspecified
